headline: Daily market wrap: top stocks - Qualcomm, Keurig Dr Pepper, and Albemarle
summary: Monday, October 27, 2025 The Market was bullish today, with a new wave of fresh records in the three major indices. The S&P 500 was up 1.2% at closing, thanks to easing US-China trade tensions.The Nasdaq Composite, up 1.9% gained more than 400 points on Monday.The Dow Jones Industrial Average ...
